title: Patient location
fullText:
Any intended location of a patient within a patient area, whether or not occupied by the patient.
Where the location of a patient undergoing a body-type or cardiac-type procedure is likely to vary for different occasions (e.g. in some operating theatres) the patient location extends laterally to the entire room. This includes locations for incubators or cribs in delivery suites.
